Great café! Definitely a favorite. The staff was incredibly friendly and kind. Service was a bit slow, but not excessively. I had pesto pasta for lunch--marvelous and perfect portion. My friend had a 'bombs chocolate' (chocolate cake) and it was very dense and rich--nothing special but delicious nonetheless. Bonus for American tourists--this café allows for take-out coffee, though with such a lovely setting and directly across from Sagrada Família, it's worth taking your time for the meal!
